about_the_game:
Let's have fun playing rock-paper-scissors with Santa!

Can you win a game of rock-paper-scissors with Santa?

The game is very simple.

Aim to win 5 times in a row!

Overview:

A big game of rock-paper-scissors with Santa.

On Christmas night, a beautiful Santa girl suddenly appears.

The player demands ‘Santa's underpants’, which is an insane turn of events!

Main game content

While reading the novel part of the game, the player challenges to a total of five rock-paper-scissors-paper games.

The story changes depending on who wins or loses the Janken matches in a multi-ending format.

Short but rich dialogue.

Includes many exclusive dialogues and situations depending on the winners and losers.

Enjoy the characters' different facial expressions and comical reactions.

Easy-to-play controls for everyone.

Easy to use controls, even for novice novelists.

Only click to play rock-paper-scissors.

Comical and light-hearted BGM

A large selection of bright, fast-paced songs and sound effects.

The sounds switch from scene to scene, further accelerating the tempo of the story.

Play time (reference).

Short story specification of about 5 minutes per week.

Translated with (free version)

content_descriptors.notes: This game will focus on panties. It is not sexually explicit, but please use caution when playing as it deals with underwear.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-1005G1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics (i3)
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
